thread.section_title: The Lexington New York City, Autograph Collection - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very pleased
thread.title_full: Very pleased - Review of The Lexington New York City, Autograph Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: shottieman
title: Very pleased
text:
Stayed for business trip March 2017. Great location for exploring Midtown on foot. Room on 15th floor with city views very comfortable although bathroom very small and closet is partly obscured by radiator!
Jazz in the lobby in the evenings
Raffles bar/ restaurant on site and Starbucks plus free lobby coffee.
Would have liked a later checkout as we had a very late flight home but the Hotel unable to oblige as full so beware if flying late. They also charge $3 / luggage item to store.
